property.name: batch support
property.description: Tells if the tool supports batch processing.

property.name: number of tools
property.description: Number of tools that can handle this format.(open, save and other)

property.name: number of tools:open
property.description: Number of tools that can open documents of this format.

property.name: number of tools:save
property.description: Number of tools that can save documents of this format.

property.name: number of tools:others
property.description: Number of tools that can handle documents of this format, beyond open, save

property.name: format-license
property.description: General information about license, if there are any rights restrictions. Refers to http://p2-registry.ecs.soton.ac.uk/pronom/risk_categories/rights

property.name: format-license:open
property.description: Tells if there are no rights restrictions. Refers to http://p2-registry.ecs.soton.ac.uk/pronom/risk_categories/rights/open

property.name: format-license: ipr protected
property.description: Tells if this format is ipr protected. Refers to http://p2-registry.ecs.soton.ac.uk/pronom/risk_categories/rights/ipr_protected

property.name: format-license: proprietary
property.description: Tells if this is a proprietary format. Refers to http://p2-registry.ecs.soton.ac.uk/pronom/risk_categories/rights/proprietary

property.name: complexity of format
property.description: A statement about the complexity of this format. Refers to http://p2-registry.ecs.soton.ac.uk/pronom/risk_categories/complexity/ .. comment

property.name: disclosure of format
property.description: A statement about the openness of this format. Refers to http://p2-registry.ecs.soton.ac.uk/pronom/risk_categories/disclosure/ .. comment

property.name: ubiquity of format
property.description: A statement about to which extent this format is used. Refers to http://p2-registry.ecs.soton.ac.uk/pronom/risk_categories/ubiquity/ .. comment

property.name: stability of format
property.description: A statement about the stability of format. Refers to http://p2-registry.ecs.soton.ac.uk/pronom/risk_categories/stability/ .. comment

property.name: documentation quality
property.description: A statement about the quality of the documentation. Refers to http://p2-registry.ecs.soton.ac.uk/pronom/risk_categories/documentation_quality/ .. comment
